item.title: Career Support
item.description: Career Support This document serves as a place holder for content that will be collaboratively created at Hackathon. link to hack.md doc Presentation of the breakout room topic Step Exposition of examples OR individual/collective practices Discussion and summary of challenges Return of participants and organizers to the main workshop room Questions for Group What other tools have you used for this purpose? How does GitHub compare to other tools you’ve used for this purpose?
